description: If n = p_1^e_1 * ... * p_k^e_k, p_1 < ... < p_k primes, then a(n) = min { p_i^e_i }.
comments: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, smallest unitary divisor of n that is larger than 1.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
prog: (PARI) A034684(n) = {local(f,m);if(n==1,1,f=factor(n);m=f[1,1]^f[1,2];for(i=1,matsize(f)[1],m=min(m,f[i,1]^f[i,2]));m)} [From _Michael B. Porter_, Jan 28 2010](Haskell)a034684 = minimum . a141809_row  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 29 2013
author: _Erich Friedman_
